# Add new guide

Use this template to propose a new guide or major doc addition.

## Summary
Provide a one-line summary of the guide you propose.

## Why this guide
Explain why this guide is needed and who will benefit.

## Suggested location
Where should this live? (e.g., `multi-dev-guides/startup-dev-guides/docs/flutter/`)

## Outline
Short outline of sections you plan to include.

## Example content
Add a short example paragraph or commands that would appear in the guide.

---
Once you fill this form, create an issue and attach any example content or design artifacts.
